open-ended.translation[0].definitions[0]: something that is open-ended does not have a definite answer or definite rules about how it must be done
open-ended.translation[1].definitions[0]: if someone’s involvement in something is open-ended, it has no limit or end
The White House asked Congress for open-ended authority to cover the Pentagon’s costs.
Our commitment to the project is totally open-ended, and we will pay all expenses.
